TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsProtectionEnum extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義 Cookie 使用的加密類型 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Defines the type of encryption, if any, to use for cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您選取所有的值，系統會根據設定的資料驗證演算法[machineKey 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)標記。If you select the All value, the system uses the configured data-validation algorithm, based on the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) tag. 這是預設值，並建議值。This is the default, and recommended, value. 如果您選取 [無]，cookie 可能會受到純文字攻擊。If you select None, cookies might be subject to plaintext attacks. 如果您選取驗證時，使用串連驗證金鑰與 cookie 資料、 運算訊息驗證碼 (MAC)，以及將 MAC 附加至傳出 cookie 的 cookie 驗證建立 cookie。If you select Validation, the cookie is created using cookie validation by concatenating a validation key with the cookie data, computing a Message Authentication Code (MAC), and appending the MAC to the outgoing cookie. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉型別。The following code example shows how to use the enumeration. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題以了解如何取得 > 一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.FormsProtectionEnum All = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定應用程式同時使用資料驗證與加密，以協助保護 Cookie。

span.span: Specifies that the application use both data validation and encryption to help protect cookies.

summary.span: 這個選項會使用已設定的資料驗證演算法 (根據 項目)。

span.span: This option uses the configured data-validation algorithm (based on the element).

summary.span: 如果可以使用三重 DES (3DES)，且金鑰長度至少是 48 個位元組，則三重 DES (3DES) 會用於加密；

span.span: Triple-DES (3DES) is used for encryption, if it is available and if the key is at least 48 bytes long.

summary.span: 為預設值 (同時也是建議值)。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.FormsProtectionEnum Encryption = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定 Cookie 會使用三重 DES 或 DES 加密，但是資料驗證不會在 Cookie 上執行。

span.span: Specifies that cookies are encrypted using Triple-DES or DES, but data validation is not performed on cookies.

summary.span: 以這種方式使用的 Cookie 可能會受到所選擇的純文字安全性攻擊。

span.span: Cookies used this way might be subject to chosen plaintext security attacks.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.FormsProtectionEnum None = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定在只因為個人化理由使用 Cookie 而使得安全性要求較低的網站上停用加密和驗證。

span.span: Specifies that both encryption and validation are disabled for sites that use cookies only for personalization and thus have weaker security requirements.

summary.span: 不建議以這種方式使用 Cookie；不過，這是使用 .NET Framework 啟用個人化時最不耗用資源的方法。

span.span: Using cookies in this manner is not recommended; however, it is the least resource-intensive way to enable personalization using the .NET Framework.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Configuration.FormsProtectionEnum Validation = int32(3)

summary.span: 指定應用程式使用驗證機制 (Scheme)，以驗證加密 Cookie 的內容在傳送時沒有變更。

span.span: Specifies that the application use a validation scheme to verify that the contents of an encrypted cookie have not been altered in transit.

summary.span: Cookie 的建立是藉由串連驗證金鑰和 Cookie 資料，計算訊息驗證程式碼 (Message Authentication Code，MAC)，並將 MAC 附加於外送的 Cookie。

span.span: The cookie is created by concatenating a validation key with the cookie data, computing a Message Authentication Code (MAC), and appending the MAC to the outgoing cookie.
